description: This light vegetarian paella is packed with Mediterranean flavours and vegetables.
keywords: Paella,Seafood free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Zucchini,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Artichoke & Olive Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, green and red, diced
1 large zucchini, sliced into half moons
2 medium lemon, juice and zest of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat the oil in a wide, oven proof pan on medium high heat and cook the diced onion, capsicums and zucchini for 5 minutes to soften. Add the garlic, turmeric and paprika and cook for 2 minutes. Mix in the tomato puree.

Stir in the paella rice and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the vegetable stock and add the artichokes, olives, lemon zest and juice. Season with cracked black pepper and place in the oven to bake for 45 minutes.
Scatter over the chopped parsley, add lemon wedges and serve.
